repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.unittitle: Bill Communications Sales and Marketing Management Vertical Files
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.
did.abstract: Bill Communications, Inc., a subsidiary of Dutch publisher VNU Business Publications, is a business-to-business publisher and organizer of trade shows. Sales and Marketing Management is one of their main trade journals. The Bill Communications Sales and Marketing Management Vertical Files cover the years 1960-1994, with the bulk of the material dating 1975-1985. Topics include advertising, black middle class, finance, food industry, hiring, legal perspectives, management, marketing, media, packaging, product trends, real estate market, research, the Robinson-Patman Act, salesmen and salesmanship, research, telephone industry, training, women consumers, youth market and youth alcohol use, and zip codes. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Bill Communications Sales and Marketing Management Vertical Files, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Bill Communications Sales and Marketing Management Vertical Files were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a gift in 1994.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accession 94-102 is described in this finding aid.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The Bill Communications Sales and Marketing Management Vertical Files cover the years 1960-1994, with the bulk of the material dating 1975-1985. Topics include advertising, black middle class, finance, food industry, hiring, legal perspectives, management, marketing, media, packaging, product trends, real estate market, research, the Robinson-Patman Act, salesmen and salesmanship, research, telephone industry, training, women consumers, youth market and youth alcohol use, and zip codes.

arrangement.head: Collection Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged alphabetically by topic. Original folder titles were retained.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Related materials may be found in the following Hartman Center collections:

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: [Contains book on the Robinson-Patman Act and allowances within company.]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: [Contains manuals; Annotated Readings in Social Security, and Social Security Programs Throughout the World 1981.]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: [File contains super market newspapers and magazines, and books; The National Study of Super Market Shoppers 1979-1980, and SN Distribution Study of Grocery Store Sales 1982.]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: [Contains actual surveys filled out and blank survey forms.]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: [File contains TV guides, and rating guides.]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: [Contains booklets on how to trade stamps and the economic value of stamp trading.]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: [Contains book Travel Trends in the United States and Canada and copies of travel magazines.]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: [Contains newsletters on tourism and travel. Also includes books; Bibliography on tourism and Travel-Research Studies, Reports and Articles Vol I-III.]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: [Contains book; Directory of UGPCC Members of the Fall/Winter 1974.]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: [Contains book Young Adults: Distilled Spirits Study 1975, and studies on the college market.]
